site_name: LAND ADJACENT TO, BRASTED CLOSE, LONDON, SE26
description: Details submitted in compliance with Condition 5b (Materials and Design Quality), 6a (Refuse Storage); 7a (Cycle Parking Provision); Condition 8a (Hard Landscaping); Condition 10a (Soft Landscaping); Condition 11a (Boundary Treatment); Condition 13a (Delivery and Servicing Plan); Condition 14a (Travel Plan); Condition 18b (Obscure Glazed Windows); Condition 19a (Road Safety Audit); Condition 20a (Parking Management Plan) of the Planning Permission DC/18/107210 dated 10/04/2019 (as amended by s96a DC/21/120451 dated 16/02/2021) for the demolition of existing garages and structures on land adjacent to Brasted Close SE26 to allow for the erection of a new part 3/part 4 storey building to provide eleven (11) self-contained dwellings (5x1 bed and 6x2 bed inc. 1x 'accessible and adaptable' unit (M4(2)) and 1x 'wheelchair user' unit (M4(3)) at Ground Floor), together with associated refuse and recycling storage facilities, cycle storage, car parking and landscaping works.
